function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear national legislation on hygienic requirements for housing","Impact":"Difficulty in ensuring good health standards and creating a healthy living environment","Mitigation":"Update the previous ministerial decree and integrate regulations into a single national legislation","Technologies":"Legislative measures, policy integration","People":"Designers, builders, Public Health Officers","Owner":"Government, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Limited role of Public Health Officers in design and construction choices","Impact":"Risk of overlooking health standards in building design and construction","Mitigation":"Enhance the role of Public Health Officers in decision-making processes for new buildings and renovations","Technologies":"Policy changes, collaborative decision-making processes","People":"Public Health Officers, designers, builders","Owner":"Government, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Dependency on the competence of designers and responsibility of builders for health in design solutions","Impact":"Varying standards of health considerations in building design and construction","Mitigation":"Provide standardized guidelines and training for designers and builders to prioritize health in design solutions","Technologies":"Educational programs, standardized design guidelines","People":"Designers, builders","Owner":"Government, educational institutions"}]}
